Elimination Creatures ShillienForbidden Gates
In Underground the cradle of the Goddess of Destruction opened his eyes, and chaos began to envelop the world. Create Shillien, receiving orders of the Goddess of Destruction, came to the surface of the earth to destroy us all. Protect the world from creatures Shillien!
Destroy the Resurrected Creatures, Crazy Creatures, Greedy Creatures, creatures of Hell and envoys of Shillien.
